body.name: J.R. Watkins Liquid Hand Soap With Dispenser, Moisturizing Hand Soap, Alcohol-Free Hand Wash, Cruelty-Free, USA Made Liquid Soap For Bathroom or Kitchen, Lemon, 11 Fl Oz, 3 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 54 mins
features: SKIN NOURISHING: Give your hands a gentle yet thorough clean without drying out your hands, J.R. Watkins hand soaps leave your skin feeling smooth and beautifully cleansed. For added hydration and nourishment, follow every hand wash with our shea butter hand cream.

AMAZING SCENT: Our customers love our hand wash soap for its soothing & refreshing scents and we make sure that’s what our all natural hand soap is all about. Inspire compliments with our wide variety of scented hand soap products!

CRAFTED CLEAN: Your go-to bathroom hand soap or kitchen hand soap shouldn't be harmful to your skin. That's why we believe in creating high-quality products with ingredients from natural sources that work even with sensitive skin with no parabens, dyes, or phthalates.
100% CRUELTY-FREE: J.R Watkins is proudly certified and recognized by Leaping Bunny as a brand that doesn’t test on animals. Get a cleansing kitchen or bathroom soap crafted with a conscience.

MADE IN THE USA: Since 1868, we've made products like our hand soap for bathroom or kitchen satisfy thousands of customers due to its long-lasting all natural formula where a small amount of soap goes a long way for both kids and adults!
body.description: Our non-drying gel hand soap works into a soft lather for clean, freshly scented hands. Made with plant-based ingredients.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,543 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #33 in Hand Wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Cleaning, Lightly Scented. Easy to Use.
reviews.reviewText: The scent is not powerful. Once you've rinsed and dried your hands, it's tough to even detect.Mostly, you'll smell it while you're washing. Lavender is very calming to me, so I enjoy it.The cleansing is thorough: it removes oils, lotions and dirt with aplomb.The unique corner-cut bag and screw-top dispenser make it exceedingly easy to refill a soap pump.We're a household of two, and during the pandemic, WFH and a job search (where there was frequent hand-washing) one pack of these lasted well over six months. Terrific value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO SOFT ON SKIN
reviews.reviewText: The natural ingredients are appealing to me. The lather is just right. The scent lasts in my sink and refreshes the area. My hands feel soft. My skin does not dry out from this product. It rinses well. The value is great compared to many other brands. I have the Lemon for Kitchen too. Love these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why Watkins has been around since 1868…
reviews.reviewText: Integrity. Natural ingredients. Wholesome, fragrant, flavorful. Competitive pricing. That’s what comes to mind for most who are familiar with J.R. Watkins. This wonderfully aromatic lemon soap that leaves hands clean and soft is just one of their many quality products. (As another reviewer said, their vanilla is also incredible, hands down our favorite.) There are two adults in our home, one works full time away from home, the other at home. We have a small dog, do our own landscaping, cook from scratch and spend a lot of time in our workshop on DIY projects, so we wash our hands constantly. We keep a dispenser next to six sinks - 3 bathrooms, kitchen, shop and the basement snack/coffee bar, and use about 4 gallons of liquid soap a year. Out-of-town guests a few times a year and those who come for an evening use some of it. That’s why it’s so important to have soap that doesn’t turn our hands into sandpaper. Anyone who uses it in our home loves the scent and the way it makes their hands feel. Without hesitation this soap gets my highest recommendation. Almost forgot - aside from the fabulous soap, the packaging saves in so many different ways and it’s recyclable! ***I have no personal affiliation with Watkins, family and friends included, and receive no form of compensation for submitting this review. ***

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I switched to this brand after wanting to make some cleaner choices of my everyday products. I was a little nervous ordering online, because I'm sensitive to smells, and you never know what you're going to get. Safe to say, this stuff is amazing! It has a lovely smell, that isn't overpowering. It feels good on my skin, and suds up easily. I also love how the refill containers are constructed. Makes it super easy to refill my soap dispensers. Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice soap overall.
reviews.reviewText: It is not abrasive, smells nice does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Great, Cleans Hands Well
reviews.reviewText: I was pleased to get a three pack of my all time favorite J.R. Watkins lemon hand soap at a decent price. They arrived securely packaged.This soap has a fresh lemon scent and is soft on the skin. I prefer it to any other hand soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite hand soap!
reviews.reviewText: This soap leaves my hands clean and not stripped of moisture. The mild scent is fresh and I like that it’s clear and made with refills.I have a clear acrylic soap pump in my bathrooms and I fill them all with JR Watkins soap. Easy, affordable and better for the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Foaming hand soap
reviews.reviewText: Great foaming hand soap and nice smell.
